problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum sum of a subarray with unique elements after deleting any elements.
problem_summary_technical: The optimal strategy is to keep all unique positive numbers and the largest single number if all are negative.
key_insights: If all numbers are negative, the maximum sum is the largest single negative number.
If there are positive numbers, we want to include all unique positive numbers.
Deleting elements allows us to form a subarray from any remaining elements, effectively picking unique positive values.
